item.description:
Start 2009 off right and join us for socializing and slope time with the Innitou Ski Club Members. Arrive New Year's Eve after 6pm and stay through Jan 4th for only $20 per night!

We will be enjoying a New Year's Eve gathering at another EICSL ski club, which transportation is available to/from for only $5 per person. The invite is $15 to include the DJ music and Champagne Toast at mid-night.

Ski/ride any of the area mountains: Attitash, Wildcat, Cranmore, & Bretton Woods or Sunday River (see their websites for ticket rates and purchasing) or explore the North Conway area for other activities of interest to you.

Other social events are scheduled for Saturday, Jan 3rd for $12 per invite. Otherwise, Red Parka pub has live music entertainment after 9pm Friday and Saturday nights.

Additional costs for food and EICSL invites are handled separately. Must be 21+ to stay at the club, and no pets allowed.

Lodging accommodations:
We have separate male and female bunkrooms, so guests will need to bring up their own bedding and bath towels. We have a full kitchen, but space is limited in the refrigerator and we have lots of essentials already for common use.

Contact Gina for more information and to RSVPâ€¦space is limited!

Payment should be handled upon arrival with the Weekend Host.
item.how_to_find_us: A Club Member or myself will be there to greet you upon arrival.

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: New Year's Weekend - Meetup Members & Guests Welcome!
